item.title: Review of the book - Computer Age Statistical Inference
item.description: During my honours year, I read the book Computer Age Statistical Inference by Bradley Efron and Trevor Hastie. The book provides a great overview of the evolution of statistical inference method with the advance of electronic computers.

item.title: Review of the Book - Computer Age Statistical Inference
item.description: During my honours year, I read the book Computer Age Statistical Inference by Bradley Efron and Trevor Hastie. The book provides a great overview of the evolution of statistical inference methods with the advance of electronic computers.
